what_went_well: Rapid implementation due to clean existing architecture.
what_could_improve: Could have added more visualization types before full rollout.
unexpected_opportunities: Users are asking for rhythm heatmaps as a follow-up.
technical_insights: Standardized feature flag system allowed for a zero-downtime promotion.

next_opportunities.immediate_expansion: Rhythm patterns in the same heatmap view.
complementary_features: FEATURE_AUDIO_WEB_WORKER for more precise data collection

impact_assessment.user_impact: 100% of users now have access to high-quality intonation feedback.
impact_assessment.competitive_impact: Strengthens position as a premium pedagogical tool.
impact_assessment.technical_debt_reduction: Reduced by cleaning up BETA status.
